original_text: But Daniel spoke carefully to Arioch. He was the captain of the king's soldiers who had gone to kill the wise men of Babylon.
korean_text: 그 때에 왕의 근위대장 아리옥이 바벨론 지혜자들을 죽이러 나가매 다니엘이 명철하고 슬기로운 말로

sentences.original_text: But Daniel spoke carefully to Arioch
He was the captain of the king's soldiers
who had gone to kill the wise men of Babylon
